intro_text.a0: A mysterious storm has begun to rage in Gensokyo.
intro_text.a1: Out of nowhere, a mysterious concert appears. It attracts various denizens of the land.
intro_text.a2: Two local bands in the land are enraged that their audience has been drained by the mysterious concert.
intro_text.a3: And so, they request the help of the most important woman in the land.
intro_text.a4: When Reimu Hakurei hears of this bizarre storm, she decides to set out and find the source of it.
